creator: liu@yellnet.co.jp
text:
I use tomcat 3.2.1 and make a mobile site now .
even I add a wml type mapping to the file /path/to/tomcat/conf/web.xml, 
like so:

  <mime-mapping>
    <extension> wml </extension>
    <mime-type> text/vnd.wap.wml </mime-type>
  </mime-mapping>
 
tomcat can not return vnd.wap.wml type infomation to 
my mobile simulator.

creator: marc.saegesser@apropos.com
text:
As of 3.2 the 'global' web.xml file is no longer supported.  These changes 
should be made to your applications WEB-INF/web.xml file.
